events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and have logged it in our system to begin assessment.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering cluster to proceed with technical evaluation stages.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to the candidate to assist through the recruitment process.
Conducted a first screening call to discuss the candidate's background in software development and assess basic fit for the role.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong enthusiasm about the engineering position and upcoming interviews.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate to further assess coding skills, system design knowledge, and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong engineering expertise and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and other policy-related questions with the candidate.
The HR interview concluded positively, with the candidate showing alignment with company values and expressing excitement to join.
An official job offer was sent to the candidate outlining the compensation package, role responsibilities, and onboarding details.
Received positive feedback from the candidate accepting the offer conditions and showing eagerness to proceed to onboarding.
The candidate has officially accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has begun, including account setups, orientation, and team introductions.
The hiring process is officially closed with a successful placement of the candidate in the engineering position.
